t: Amazon looking to fill 1,800 new positions in Portland
s: September 14, 2020 - — Amazon announced Monday that it will hire 100,000 positions across their operations network, and 1,800 of those jobs will be coming to Portland.

t: Amazon to add 400 jobs at Portland, Oregon tech hub | kgw.com
s: Amazon says it has added 3,500 jobs in Oregon this decade, most of them in warehouses. The company also has large data centers in Morrow County and eastern Oregon.
